title: Himi 149
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oua na’a ku li’aki
‘A hoku ‘Otua
‘I he’eku manavahē
Ki hoku tautea.
2.
Ka ko ho huafa tapu
Te u tokanga ki ai;
Pea u fakaongo atu,
Ho’o ngāue lelei.
3.
Pea u fai, pea u falala,
Ki ho’o Folofola,
Te ke ‘aofia ma’u pē,
Hoku laumālie.
4.
Ko e mo’oni ‘aupito
Te ke malu’i au
Mo ke taukapo’i atu
Hoku laumālie.
5.
Ka te u tatali ‘o kumi
‘I he angavaivai
‘A e ‘ofa mo’onia
‘A e ‘Afiona. *
